login.title: login
login.loginFailedMsg: Login failed, Please check your email and password
login.registerActivateEmail: Your verification email has been sent, please go to Verify

activate.activateEmailSendMsg: Activation email has been sent to your email, please check your email
activate.activateEmailContent2: Create a process. We want to make sure it's really you. Please click the button below to activate. If you don't want to activate your account, you can ignore this message.
activate.activateEmailButton: Click here to activate your account
activate.activateEmailFooter: The Web Service will never send you an email asking you to disclose or verify your password, credit card or bank account number. If you have any questions, please contact us.
